articles.description: Thomas Frank's appointment by Tottenham was a gamble that ended in a storm of toxicity, writes Phil McNulty.
articles.title: Thomas Frank sacking: Tottenham appointment a gamble that ended in failure

articles.description: England face West Indies in the ICC T20 World Cup in Mumbai - follow live scores, radio commentary and video highlights.
articles.title: England vs West Indies LIVE: ICC T20 World Cup 2026 - cricket score, radio commentary & video highlights

articles.description: Watch and follow Winter Olympics action, with Team GB's Lilah Fear and Lewis Gibson going for a figure skating medal later on day five.
articles.title: Winter Olympics 2026 LIVE: Day five - watch BBC - medals, results, TV stream & updates from Milan-Cortina

articles.description: Norwegian medal-winning biathlete Sturla Holm Laegreid apologises again for cheating on his ex-girlfriend.
articles.title: Winter Olympics: Sturla Holm Laegreid apologises after confession

articles.description: Red Bull are "the benchmark" in Formula 1 as pre-season testing begins in earnest in Bahrain, says Mercedes team boss Toto Wolff.
articles.title: F1 testing 2026: Red Bull are 'the benchmark', says Mercedes boss Toto Wolff

articles.description: BBC Sport looks at the possible runners and riders as Tottenham go in search of a new manager after the sacking of Thomas Frank - plus have your say on the options.
articles.title: Tottenham sack Thomas Frank: Pochettino, De Zerbi, Glasner, Redknapp - who could take over at Spurs?

articles.description: World number two Rory McIlroy says the Players Championship has "more of an identity" than the US PGA Championship but does not believe the tournament should become men's golf's fifth major.
articles.title: Rory McIlroy: Players Championship doesn't need to be golf's fifth major, says world number two

articles.description: Ukrainian skeleton racer Vladyslav Heraskevych continues to wear a helmet featuring images of people killed during Russia's invasion of his home country, despite the IOC banning him from doing so.
articles.title: Vladyslav Heraskevych: Ukraine skeleton racer wears helmet despite IOC ban

articles.description: Real Madrid and Uefa say they are set to end their legal dispute over the failed European Super League project.
articles.title: European Super League: Real Madrid and Uefa set to end legal dispute

articles.description: Australia impress in their T20 World Cup opener as they make light work of beating Ireland by 67 runs in Colombo.
articles.title: T20 World Cup: Nathan Ellis stars as Australia leave Ireland on brink of exit
